HILLARY CLINTON IS THE MOST CORRUPT PERSON EVER TO SEEK THE OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY OF THE UNITED STATES. SHE IS BEING PROTECTED BY A TOTALLY RIGGED SYSTEM THAT I HAVE BEEN TALKING ABOUT FOR A LONG TIME.

REAL CHANGE BEGINS WITH IMMEDIATELY REPEALING AND REPLACING THE DISASTER KNOWN AS OBAMACARE. WE ARE LIVING IN A DIVIDED NATION. WE ARE GOING TO BE BROUGHT TOGETHER. MAKE AMERICA WEALTHY AGAIN. WE WILL MAKE AMERICA STRONG AGAIN. WE WILL MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN. AND WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.
OR DO YOU WANT AMERICA TO BE RULED BY YOU, THE PEOPLE? THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO HAVE BEEN FOR A LONG TIME.
SO THE FIRST THING WE SHOULD DO, LET'S GET RID OF HILLARY. OKAY? THAT IS PROBABLY -- THAT WOULD BE A VERY GOOD FIRST STEP, THAT IS A GOOD FIRST STEP.

MY CONTRACT WITH THE AMERICAN VOTER BEGINS WITH A PLAN TO END GOVERNMENT CORRUPTION AND TO TAKE OUR COUNTRY BACK FROM THE SPECIAL INTERESTS. I WANT THE ENTIRE CORRUPT WASHINGTON ESTABLISHMENT TO HEAR OUR WORDS, OUR WORDS, WHEN WE SAY, YOU KNOW WHAT WE ARE GOING TO SAY, WE ARE GOING TO WIN TODAY AND WE ARE GOING TO WASHINGTON, D.C. TO DRAIN THE SWAMP.

WE DON'T NEED JAY-Z OR BEYONCE. WE DON'T NEED JOHN BON JOVI. WE DON'T NEED LADY GAGA. ALL WE NEED IS GREAT IDEAS TO MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN. I AM WITH YOU. I WILL FIGHT FOR YOU. AND I WILL WIN FOR YOU. I PROMISE.
WE ARE FIGHTING FOR EVERY CITIZEN WHO BELIEVES THAT GOVERNMENT SHOULD SERVE THE PEOPLE, NOT THE DONORS, AND NOT THE SPECIAL INTERESTS. AND WE ARE FIGHTING TO BRING US ALL TOGETHER AS AMERICANS.

HER PLAN WILL IMPORT GENERATIONS OF TERRORISM, EXTREMISM, AND RADICALISM INTO YOUR SCHOOLS AND THROUGHOUT YOUR COMMUNITIES. WHEN I AM ELECTED PRESIDENT, WE WILL SUSPEND THE SYRIAN REFUGEE PROGRAM. AND WE WILL KEEP RADICAL ISLAMIC TERRORISTS THE HELL OUT OF OUR COUNTRY, 100%.

THEY ARE RIPPING YOUR AUTO COMPANIES APART, TAKING YOUR JOBS, CLOSING YOUR PLANTS AND MOVING THEM TO MEXICO AND OTHER PLACES, BUT MOSTLY TO MEXICO. WE WILL BRING BACK THE AUTOMOBILE INDUSTRY TO MICHIGAN -- BIGGER AND BETTER AND STRONGER THAN EVER BEFORE. YOU HAVE BEEN MISTREATED.

Are you tired of a handful of billionaires running our economy? ... We started this campaign at 3% in the national polls. We have come a long way in 10 months. And the reason we have done as well as we have, the reason that we have defied all expectations is that we are doing something very radical in American politics – we’re telling the truth.

Truth number one is that today we have a corrupt campaign finance system with Wall Street and billionaires spending unlimited sums of money, which is undermining American democracy. ... What this campaign is about is asking the American people to think outside of the box, outside of the status quo, think about a nation not where our children are being poisoned by lead in the water but where we have a cutting-edge infrastructure in roads and in bridges and in rail and in air transport. That’s where we’ve got to go.
To my mind, democracy is not complicated. It is one person, one vote. ... The people of our country will not tolerate oligarchy.
I say to those cowardly Republican governors who are trying to suppress the vote. If you are afraid of a free and fair election, get out of politics. Get another job.

Truth number one is that today we have a corrupt campaign finance system with Wall Street and billionaires spending unlimited sums of money, which is undermining American democracy. ... This is not democracy; that is oligarchy.
We are doing something very radical in American politics – we’re telling the truth. ... We are listening to the American people and not just wealthy campaign contributors.

We can do it without destroying the American middle class through disastrous trade policies. So I say to corporate America, 'You want us to buy your products? Start manufacturing those products here in America, not in China.'

It is a rigged economy – an economy in which we have today a grotesque level of income and wealth inequality which is unsustainable and un-American. ...
